languages.text: "Я принимаю предложение леди Кассии — виновницу нападения казнят, а Дом Орселлио выплатит династии фон Валанциус отступные".

traits.locale_text: "Я принимаю предложение леди Кассии — виновницу нападения казнят, а Дом Орселлио выплатит династии фон Валанциус отступные".

languages.text: "I accept Lady Cassia's offer — the instigator of the attack will be executed, and House Orsellio will pay compensation to the von Valancius dynasty."
languages.original_text: "Я принимаю предложение леди Кассии — виновницу нападения казнят, а Дом Орселлио выплатит династии фон Валанциус отступные".

traits.locale_text: "I accept Lady Cassia's offer — the instigator of the attack will be executed, and House Orsellio will pay compensation to the von Valancius dynasty."
"I accept Lady Cassia's offer — the instigator of the attack will be executed, and House Orsellio will pay compensation to the von Valancius dynasty."
"I accept Lady Cassia's offer — the instigator of the attack will be executed, and House Orsellio will pay compensation to the von Valancius dynasty."
"I accept Lady Cassia's offer — the instigator of the attack will be executed, and House Orsellio will pay compensation to the von Valancius dynasty."
"I accept Lady Cassia's offer — the instigator of the attack will be executed, and House Orsellio will pay compensation to the von Valancius dynasty."

languages.text: “我接受卡西娅女士的提议。这场袭击的煽动者将被处决，奥赛罗家族要向冯·瓦兰修斯王朝支付赔偿。”
languages.original_text: "I accept Lady Cassia's offer — the instigator of the attack will be executed, and House Orsellio will pay compensation to the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: “我接受卡西娅女士的提议。这场袭击的煽动者将被处决，奥塞罗家族要向冯·瓦兰修斯王朝支付赔偿。”

languages.text: «Aceptaré la oferta de lady Cassia. Se ejecutará a la instigadora del ataque y la casa Orsellio pagará una compensación a la dinastía von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "I accept Lady Cassia's offer — the instigator of the attack will be executed, and House Orsellio will pay compensation to the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: «Aceptaré la oferta de lady Cassia. Se ejecutará a la instigadora del ataque y la casa Orsellio pagará una compensación a la dinastía von Valancius».

languages.text: 「カシア殿の申し出を受け入れよう…攻撃の扇動者は処刑され、オーセリオ家はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝へと賠償金を支払う」
languages.original_text: "I accept Lady Cassia's offer — the instigator of the attack will be executed, and House Orsellio will pay compensation to the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: 「カシア殿の申し出を受け入れよう…攻撃の扇動者は処刑され、オーセリオ家はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝へと賠償金を支払う」

languages.text: "Ich nehme Lady Cassias Angebot an – der Anstifter des Angriffs wird hingerichtet, und das Haus Orsellio wird eine Wiedergutmachung an die Dynastie von Valancius leisten."
languages.original_text: "I accept Lady Cassia's offer — the instigator of the attack will be executed, and House Orsellio will pay compensation to the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Ich nehme Lady Cassias Angebot an – der Anstifter des Angriffs wird hingerichtet, und das Haus Orsellio wird eine Wiedergutmachung an die Dynastie von Valancius leisten.

languages.text: « J'accepte l'offre de dame Cassia. Les instigateurs de l'attaque seront exécutés, et la maison Orsellio offrira une compensation à la dynastie von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "I accept Lady Cassia's offer — the instigator of the attack will be executed, and House Orsellio will pay compensation to the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: « J'accepte l'offre de dame Cassia. Les instigateurs de l'attaque seront exécutés, et la maison Orsellio offrira une compensation à la dynastie von Valancius. »

languages.text: "Leydi Cassia'nın teklifini kabul ediyorum. Saldırıyı kışkırtan, idam edilecek; Orsellio Hanesi, von Valancius hanedanlığına tazminat ödeyecek."
languages.original_text: "I accept Lady Cassia's offer — the instigator of the attack will be executed, and House Orsellio will pay compensation to the von Valancius dynasty."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Cassia'nın teklifini kabul ediyorum. Saldırının kışkırtıcısı idam edilecek ve Orsellio Hanesi, von Valancius hanedanlığına bir tazminat ödeyecek."
